by.chmut.giftit.dao

Interface OrderDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<java.lang.Long,Order>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderDaoImpl

    public interface OrderDao
extends Dao<java.lang.Long,Order>
    The interface Order dao implements the access mechanism required to work with the data source specifically for Order entity.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
